rbiom 1.0.3.9063
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

adiv_boxplot()

Visualize alpha diversity with boxplots.

adiv_corrplot()

Visualize alpha diversity with scatterplots and trendlines.

adiv_table()

Estimate the diversity of each sample.

apcoa()

PCoA adjusted for corvariates.

as_percent()

Convert absolute counts to relative abundances.

bdiv_biplot()

Display distances between samples as a 2-D scatter plot.

bdiv_boxplot()

Visualize BIOM data with boxplots.

bdiv_distmat()

Make a distance matrix of samples vs samples.

bdiv_heatmap()

Display beta diversities in an all vs all grid.

bdiv_ord_table()

Reduce a distance matrix to two or three dimensions

bdiv_table()

Make a data.frame of distances between samples.

bdply()

Split BIOM by metadata, apply function, and return results in a data frame.

blply()

Split BIOM by metadata, apply function, and return results in a list.

`counts<-`()

Set the abundance counts.

counts()

Get the abundance counts.

depth()

The rarefaction depth of a BIOM object.

distill()

Convert to a data.frame with metadata and diversity/abundance values.

embed_code()

Wraps R code with Markdown syntax highlighting.

embed_csv()

Converts a data.frame to a download link.

has_phylogeny()

Checks if a phylogenetic tree is present.

has_sequences()

Checks if DNA sequences are present.

hmp50

Human Microbiome Project - 50 sample demo dataset.

`id<-`()

Set a BIOM object's id or comment.

id()

Get BIOM object's identifier / title.

info()

Get BIOM object's miscellaneous information.

init_cache()

Initialize caching for expensive biom operations.

is_rarefied()

Checks if a BIOM object is rarefied.

`metadata<-`()

Set the BIOM object's metadata.

metadata()

Get the sample metadata.

metrics()

List all the options for each type of metric.

nsamples()

Number of samples in a BIOM.

ntaxa()

Number of taxa in a BIOM.

`phylogeny<-`()

Set the phylogenetic tree.

phylogeny()

Get the phylogenetic tree.

plot_heatmap()

Create a heatmap with tracks and dendrograms from any matrix.

print(<BIOM>)

Summarize the contents of a BIOM object

rarefy()

Subset counts so that all samples have the same number of observations.

rare_corrplot()

Visualize rarefaction curves with scatterplots and trendlines.

rbiom

rbiom: Read/Write, Transform, and Summarize BIOM Data

read_biom()

Extracts counts, metadata, taxonomy, and phylogeny from a biom file.

read_fasta()

Parse a fasta file into a named character vector.

read_tree()

Read a newick formatted phylogenetic tree.

repair()

Run after manually editing a BIOM object's content.

`sample_names<-`()

Set the sample names.

sample_names()

Get the sample names.

sample_sums()

Sum the observations in each sample.

select()

Reduce samples to a specific list

`sequences<-`()

Set nucleotide sequences associated with each taxonomic identifier.

sequences()

Nucleotide sequences associated with each taxonomic identifier.

stats_table()

Compute p-values for data vs metadata.

subset(<BIOM>)

Subset samples using the BIOM's metadata or taxonomy.

subtree()

Create a subtree by specifying tips to keep.

taxa_boxplot()

Visualize BIOM data with boxplots.

taxa_corrplot()

Visualize taxa abundance with scatterplots and trendlines.

taxa_heatmap()

Display taxa abundances as a heatmap.

taxa_matrix()

Generate a matrix of samples by taxa, at the specified taxonomic rank.

taxa_means()

Get the taxa abundances.

`taxa_names<-`()

Set the taxa names.

taxa_names()

Get the taxa names.

`taxa_ranks<-`()

Set the taxa rank names.

taxa_ranks()

Get the taxa ranks.

taxa_stacked()

Display taxa abundances as a stacked bar graph.

taxa_sums()

Get the taxa abundances.

taxa_table()

Generate a data.frame of taxa abundance for each sample at the specified taxonomic rank.

`taxonomy<-`()

Set the taxonomy table.

taxonomy()

Get the taxonomy table.

tips()

Names of a phylogenetic tree's tips/leafs.

top_taxa()

Get the names of the most abundant taxa.

unifrac()

Compute Weighted and Unweighted UniFrac distance matrices.

write_biom()

Write counts, metadata, taxonomy, and phylogeny to a biom file.

write_fasta()

Write sequences from a BIOM object to a file in fasta format.

write_tree()

Write a newick formatted phylogenetic tree.

write_xlsx()

Write data and summary information to a Microsoft Excel-compatible workbook.
